resources.string: The classic set of instructions.Tap, swipe, and shake your way to the top!
Make full use of your touch screen using this game mode. Tap and swipe instructions only.
Move, turn, tilt, and twist your device in all directions. All movement-based instructions are enabled.\n\nBe careful not to drop your device!
This mode will put your dexterity to the test. Swipe instructions only.\n\nHow fast can your fingers go?
Use your keyboard to write words and dial phone numbers as quickly as possible. Type and dial instructions only.\n\nWatch out for typos!
Put your reflexes to the test in this ultimate game mode. All instructions are enabled.\n\nHow long can you last?
Prefer to take things slow? Start the game with extra time to complete each instruction.
A standard game of Reflex Revolution. Start the game with the regular amount of time to complete each instruction.
Want to get straight into the action? Start the game with less time to complete each instruction.
Your high score information is saved automatically for each game mode and difficulty.\n\nPress and hold down the button below to delete your high score information.

During each game, random actions will appear in the middle of the screen. You must complete each action within a limited amount of time. You will keep receiving new actions until you fail by either not completing the action in time or making an incorrect action. The amount of time you have to complete each action goes down as the game progresses. \n\nHow to complete each instruction is described in the following sections.
The simplest instruction: tap the screen!
> Double Tap: Tap the screen twice in quick succession.
> Hold Tap: Tap the screen and hold your finger on it for a short period.
> Don\'t Tap: Wait for the timer to run out without taping the screen. You lose the game if you tap.
Swipe the screen in the given direction. You lose the game if you swipe in the wrong direction.
Possible Directions: Left, Right, Up, Down.
> Opposite Swipe: Swipe in the opposite direction of the given direction.
Shake it up! Shake your device in any direction.
Jump in the air! Move the device up, regardless of the device\'s orientation.
Don\'t move! Keep the device as still as possible until the timer runs out. You lose the game if the device moves/rotates too much.
Turn the device in the given direction (left or right).
Tilt the device in the given direction (forward or backward).
Twist the device in the given direction (left or right).
Type the given 5-letter word. Your device\'s keyboard will pop-up automatically. Capitalization is ignored.
Dial the given 7-digit phone number. Your device\'s keypad will pop-up automatically. You don\'t need to enter the dash \'-\' symbol in the middle.
